name: Pirates and Potatoes
description:
Controls

Left/Up: A
Right/Down: D

Info

Pirates and Potatoes was created in 3 hours for the Trijam #175 with the theme "Bring back potatoes". Play in Fullscreen for the best experience. 

Assets are a mix between freely available, edited, and created as part of the jam. I got most of my vision implemented in the 3h, but some features like a dynamic fight against the kraken did not make it into this version.

Credits Game design and implementation:

da Finnci

Sprites used:

Pirate Pack by Kenney
Pergament texture by MELLE

Music used:

"Seaside village" by Leonardo Paz
"A sailor's chant" by Eike Germann 
"The kraken" by Leonardo Paz
"Ready cannons and fire" by Leonardo Paz
"Pirate Theme" by Olivier Bérubé
"Treasure hunter" by Tad Miller

Sounds used:

Cannon fire sound by Eike Germann
Watersplash sound by the Blender Foundation
Writing with pencil sound by NachtmahrTV
